name: Inaccurate combat: Doc's Disappearance
description: Inaccurate combat docs disappearance is a 2D classic arcade inspired roguelite. Find out the mystery behind why doc disappeared. Play it single player or if you have 2 controllers and a friend play Co-op.  In this fun and challenging roguelite play to Level 3 and fight the boss then keep playing see how far you can get!
